00009 #include "TTLimiter.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 TTLimiter::TTLimiter(TTUInt8 newMaxNumChannels)
00013         : TTAudioObject::TTAudioObject(newMaxNumChannels)
00014 {
00015         // register our parameters
00016         registerParameter(TT("bypass"),         kTypeInt32,             &attrBypass,    (TTGetterMethod)NULL, (TTSetterMethod)&TTDegrade::setBypass);
00017         registerParameter(TT("bitdepth"),       kTypeInt32,             &attrBitdepth,  (TTGetterMethod)NULL, (TTSetterMethod)&TTDegrade::setBitdepth);
00018         registerParameter(TT("srRatio"),        kTypeFloat32,   &attrSrRatio);
00019 
00020         // register for notifications from the parent class so we can allocate memory as required
00021         registerMessage(TT("updateMaxNumChannels"), (TTMethod)&TTDCBlock::updateMaxNumChannels);
00022 
00023         setParameterValue(TT("maxNumChannels"), newMaxNumChannels);
00024         setParameterValue(TT("bypass"),                 kTTBoolNo);
00025         setParameterValue(TT("bitdepth"),               24);
00026         setParameterValue(TT("srRatio"),                1.0);
00027         setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTLimiter::processAudio);
00028 
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 TTLimiter::~TTLimiter()
00033 {
00034         free(output);
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 TTErr TTLimiter::updateMaxNumChannels()
00039 {
00040         short i;
00041         
00042         output = (TTSampleValue*)malloc(sizeof(TTSampleValue) * maxNumChannels);
00043         for(i=0; i<maxNumChannels; i++)
00044                 output[i] = 0.0;                                // clear the values
00045         return kTTErrNone;
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 TTErr TTLimiter::setBitdepth(TTValue& newValue)
00050 {
00051         attrBitdepth = clip((int)newValue, 1, 24);
00052         bitShift = 24 - attrBitdepth;
00053         return kTTErrNone;
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 // DSP LOOP
00058 TTErr TTLimiter::processAudio(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00059 {
00060         short                   vs;
00061         TTSampleValue   *inSample,
00062                                         *outSample;
00063         short                   numchannels = TTAudioSignal::getMinChannelCount(in, out);
00064         short                   channel;
00065 
00066         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00067                 inSample = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00068                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00069                 vs = in.vs;
00070                 
00071                 while(vs--){
00072                         // SampeRate Reduction
00073                         accumulator += attrSrRatio;
00074                         if(accumulator >= 1.0){
00075                                 output[channel] = *inSample++;
00076                                 accumulator -= 1.0;
00077                         }
00078                 
00079                         // BitDepth Reduction
00080                         l = (long)(output[channel] * BIG_INT);                  // change float to long int
00081                         l >>= bitShift;                                                                 // shift away the least-significant bits
00082                         l <<= bitShift;                                                                 // shift back to the correct registers
00083                         *outSample++ = (float) l * ONE_OVER_BIG_INT;    // back to float
00084                 }
00085         }
00086         return kTTErrNone;
00087 }
